abstract: Despite the economic crisis gripping Europe, there is one industry in France that is still going strong. As a sucker for books about secrets, of which I have dozens, I have organized them into three subject areas.
snippet: Despite the economic crisis gripping Europe, there is one industry in France that is still going strong. As a sucker for books about secrets, of which I have dozens, I have organized them into three subject areas.
lead_paragraph: Despite the economic crisis gripping Europe, there is one industry in France that is still going strong: the discovery, telling and selling of secrets. I confess to being a sucker for books about secrets, of which I have dozens, organized in three subject areas.
